name: HiringTeamAddMember
description:
Adds a user to the hiring team for a job or application.

This tool is used to add an Ashby user to a hiring team at the application, job, or opening level. It requires the `organizationWrite` permission.

parameters.name: user_to_add_details
parameters.description: JSON containing user ID, role, and level (application, job, or opening) to add to the hiring team.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
